Key Match Events: Jimmy Butler exited the game with an ankle injury after slipping on a drive to the basket in the first quarter
Post-Match Reflections: The Heat struggled without Jimmy Butler, who exited early due to injury, leading to their loss against the Nuggets
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets defeated the Heat 135-122, with Tyler Herro, Bam Adebayo, and Duncan Robinson contributing significantly
